alert.note: Alert for Davis; Mahaska; Monroe; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:20PM CDT until March 31 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Monroe County in south central Iowa... Wapello County in southeastern Iowa... Northwestern Davis County in southeastern Iowa... Southeastern Mahaska County in south central Iowa... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 319 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blakesburg, or 8 miles west of Ottumwa, moving northeast at 60 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Wapello County. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chillicothe around 325 PM CDT. Ottumwa, Ottumwa Industrial Airport, Agency and Kirkville around 330 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Iowa.
